section.p: Deleting a dictionary can be useful when you have exported it or archived it outside of and no longer need it, and you require free space on your disk.
For deleting a shared dictionary, see .

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: Make sure that you have a backup copy of the dictionary before deleting it if it contains important data.

section.title: Calling sequence
section.p:
Select:
Dictionary List window
The dictionary you want to delete
Delete from the File menu

section.title: Options and parameters
section.p: A confirmation message appears before the dictionary is deleted.
If you select No, the delete function is canceled. If you select Yes, the dictionary is deleted.

section.title: Results
section.p: If you select Yes, the dictionary is deleted. References to this dictionary may still exist in certain folders. Update the folder properties so that the deleted dictionary is not referenced anymore.
